## @ledgerhq/hw-transport-node-hid-singleton

Allows to communicate with Ledger Hardware Wallets.

**[Node]**/Electron **(HID)** â€“ uses `node-hid` and `usb-detection`. Keep transport opened and re-use it as a singleton, one device at a time on a computer but more robust implementation.

node-hid Transport implementation
